title: Little Lucknow
description: Can a kid fall in love and actually mean it? Being in love when you are a kid is like the first innocent drop of rain that falls down unsure of its end, but knowing wherever itâ€™ll fall there will be life or thirst of a waiting flower would be quenched. So was it the lucidity and cordiality of the feeling they had and, there were guys like me with so much stance that we disregarded any such thing from the core.
author: Nitya Prakash
